text: As the 2016-17 TV season heads to the finish line, NBC has declared itself the victor in the 18-49 demo race, reclaiming the crown for the third time in four years and marking the first time in five years a network finished on top in the demo without the help of either the Super Bowl or the Olympics.
title: This Is Us Helps NBC Reclaim the Season Ratings Victory in the 18-49 Demo

twitter.title: This Is Us Helps NBC Reclaim the Season Ratings Victory in the 18-49 Demo
twitter.description: CBS falls to No. 3 for 2016-17 but is tops in total viewers for the 9th straight year.
twitter.creator: jasonlynch

og.description: CBS falls to No. 3 for 2016-17 but is tops in total viewers for the 9th straight year.
